name: Magic Tile
overview: Concentration and reasoning are two essential skills required to play Magic Tile\Duddo. IN practice, it is necessary to arrange all the available pieces on a chessboard in order to pass to the next level. The number of pieces remaining is indicated at the bottom of the screen and the piece to be placed at the the moment is indicated by an arrow. To position the pieces you must follow these criteria: They can only be placed next to other tiles of the same color or figure. If you can place a tile next to several tiles you will get bonus points. At the beginning you can select from various options including players, level of difficulty and saving and restoring games from disk. Published in Italy as Duddo in New Games Nuova serie n.6 (Febbrao 1993).
